title: How to Make Indian Pilau Rice

steps.headline: Heat the pressure cooker on the stove.
Add the cloves, bay leaf, cumin, and fennel to the pressure cooker.
Fry until the onions are golden brown.
Add the carrots, peas, cashews, and green chilies.
Add the chopped tomato and salt.
Add the water and the garam masala.
Cover and cook until the pressure cooker whistles once.
Simmer for 5 minutes after the whistle.
Remove from the heat.
steps.description: Allow the cooker to cool for 10 minutes.

text: Heat the pressure cooker on the stove.  Add the oil.  Add the cloves, bay leaf, cumin, and fennel to the pressure cooker.  Fry the mixture for 1 minute.  Add the chopped onions.  Fry until the onions are golden brown.  Add the ginger garlic paste.  Sauté the mixture for 1 minute.  Add the carrots, peas, cashews, and green chilies.  Fry the mixture for 5 minutes. Use low heat. Add the chopped tomato and salt.  Cook the mixture for 7 minutes.  Add the washed rice.  Mix thoroughly with a spatula.  Add the water and the garam masala.  Cover and cook until the pressure cooker whistles once.  Simmer for 5 minutes after the whistle.  Remove from the heat. Allow the cooker to cool for 10 minutes. Add the chopped coriander (cilantro). Stir well. Finished! Serve it with chilled raita.
